titles.title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to establish a Telecommunications Workforce Development Advisory Council within the Federal Communications Commission, and for other purposes.
Telecommunications Opportunities for Workers Engaging in Real Infrastructure Deployment Act of 2019
Telecommunications Opportunities for Workers Engaging in Real Infrastructure Deployment Act of 2019
TOWER Infrastructure Deployment Act
TOWER Infrastructure Deployment Act
Telecommunications Opportunities for Workers Engaging in Real Infrastructure Deployment Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
